Aloevera.description: A succulent plant known for its thick, fleshy leaves containing a gel-like substance.
Aloevera.uses: Soothes burns, promotes wound healing, improves skin health, aids digestion.

Amla.description: Also known as Indian Gooseberry, rich in Vitamin C and antioxidants.
Amla.uses: Boosts immunity, improves digestion, promotes hair growth, enhances skin health.

Amruta_Balli.description: Known as Giloy or Guduchi, a climbing shrub with heart-shaped leaves.
Amruta_Balli.uses: Boosts immunity, treats fever, improves digestion, manages diabetes.

Amruthaballi.description: Another name for Giloy, widely used in Ayurveda.
Amruthaballi.uses: Enhances immunity, detoxifies the body, treats chronic fever.

Arali.description: A flowering plant often used in traditional medicine.
Arali.uses: Treats respiratory issues, reduces inflammation, promotes skin health.

Ashoka.description: A tree with beautiful orange flowers, sacred in Indian culture.
Ashoka.uses: Regulates menstrual cycles, relieves pain, improves skin complexion.

Ashwagandha.description: An adaptogenic herb known for its stress-relieving properties.
Ashwagandha.uses: Reduces stress, boosts energy, improves sleep, enhances cognitive function.

Astma_weed.description: Also known as Asthma Plant (Chamaesyce hirta), used for respiratory relief.
Astma_weed.uses: Treats asthma, relieves cough, reduces inflammation.

Avacado.description: A nutrient-rich fruit with creamy flesh, though not a traditional herb, used medicinally.
Avacado.uses: Supports heart health, improves digestion, promotes skin health.

Badipala.description: A lesser-known medicinal plant in Indian tradition.

Balloon_Vine.description: Known as Cardiospermum, a climbing plant with balloon-like fruits.
Balloon_Vine.uses: Relieves joint pain, treats skin disorders, reduces inflammation.

Bamboo.description: A fast-growing grass with medicinal shoots.

Betel.description: A vine with heart-shaped leaves, culturally significant in India.

Bringaraja.description: Known as False Daisy, used in hair care.

Brahmi.description: A synonym for Bhrami, widely used in Ayurveda.

camphor.description: Derived from the camphor tree, used for its aromatic properties.
camphor.uses: Relieves pain, treats respiratory issues, repels insects.

Caricature.description: Likely Caricature Plant (Graptophyllum pictum), used ornamentally and medicinally.

Ganike.description: Likely a variant of Ganigale or a distinct herb.

Gasagase.description: Poppy seeds, used in small quantities medicinally.

Gauva.description: Synonym for Guava, a tropical fruit tree.

Malabar_Nut.description: Known as Adhatoda vasica, used for respiratory health.
